text:
Hey,

Is there any way to pass parameters to the Graphql query from the fieldValues?
For example, say i want to enable the user to select which parameters to filter on from a dropdown in the module.

Thanks!

Yes, you can use `{{ module.field }}` in the graphql comment that sets a dynamic variable. Like this <https://github.com/HubSpot/recruiting-agency-graphql-theme/blob/a09516ce31388d8e8e5f20731bed0660a6e8251a/src/data-queries/role_listings.graphql#L4|example graphql query> (from a HubL module)

I have validated and replicated this problem internally. Looks like an issue snuck in that is breaking single file modules and our tests are not catching it. For now Iâ€™d recommend moving to use module folders with an `index.js` in them until we fix this.

ps: We also need to make our builds fail when there is an error like this in the build (our bad)
